rule.q: Can PHI be stored in plain text?

answer: Do not store or transmit protected health information (PHI) in plain text. Limit PHI access to the minimum necessary workforce members. Do not include patient identifiers in logs, screenshots, or tickets.

citations.text: Do not store or transmit protected health information (PHI) in plain text.
Breaches of unsecured PHI must be reported without unreasonable delay.
Limit PHI access to the minimum necessary workforce members.
Do not include patient identifiers in logs, screenshots, or tickets.
Obtain patient authorization for nonâ€‘treatment disclosures.

Breaches of unsecured PHI must be reported without unreasonable delay.
